remarks: A lemma to assist theorems of ` || ` with two antecedents.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
statement:
dvds2lem.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( I e. ZZ /\ J e. ZZ ) ) $.
dvds2lem.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. ZZ /\ L e. ZZ ) ) $.
dvds2lem.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) $.
dvds2lem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ZZ /\ y e. ZZ ) ) -> Z e. ZZ ) $.
dvds2lem.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ZZ /\ y e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( ( x x. I ) = J /\ ( y x. K ) = L ) -> ( Z x. M ) = N ) ) $.
dvds2lem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( I || J /\ K || L ) -> M || N ) ) $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d ph x y $.
